itunes:title: Episode 493 - Special Guest Kirill "The Slutwhisperer"
title: Episode 493 - Special Guest Kirill "The Slutwhisperer"
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down in New York City with one of America's most notorious party messiahs, Kirill "The Slutwhisperer", as he chats about his Netflix film "The American Meme", how becoming internet famous led to copious amounts of sex,...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down in New York City with one of America's most notorious party messiahs, Kirill "The Slutwhisperer", as he chats about his Netflix film "The American Meme", how becoming internet famous led to copious amounts of sex, how close we are to the legalization of prostitution, why you can't fight fairly against internet trolls, and what age you stop being an orphan.  Great episode.
